content: revelation crochet along 2023 revelation is an 8 part crochet along which begins friday 22nd september 2023 each part will be published on a friday morning at approx 10am uk time you will be able to find the pattern and links to videos each week on my website and also in my facebook group helen s hookaholics i often see people who are new to my designs say that they do not think they will be able to do it although many beginners have made my designs and learned a lot along the way we will be making a full sized square blanket how much yarn will you need there will be 2 yarn packs available from woolwarehouse links can be found on my website the total amount of yarn needed is normal double knit yarn #3 weight 8-ply approx 4720 metres 5152 yards 4mm g hook finished size 152 5 cm / 60 inches naturals cotton bamboo approx 4250 metres 4648 yards 3 5mm hook finished size 142 cm / 56 inches similar to 4-ply whirls/twirls aran worsted #4 weight 10-ply approx 6167 metres 6745 yards 5 mm h hook finished size 176 5 cm / 69 1/2 inches how much yarn you need depends on how many colours you chose to use please see the details of the yarn packs in the introducing revelation post on my website to give you an idea for more information go here 1 1 https //crystalsandcrochet com/product/introducing-revelation
